domains.reason: PubMed is the most relevant source for medical and health-related research, providing up-to-date and authoritative information on cancer treatments and therapies.
Google Scholar provides a broad academic search that includes recent research on cancer, though it may not be as specialized as PubMed.
ArXiv might contain preprints on cancer research, though it's less focused on medical research compared to PubMed.
Semantic Scholar offers a comprehensive search of academic literature, but it's less specialized in medical fields compared to PubMed.
